text: The 1985 ECAC Metro Men's Basketball Tournament (now known as the Northeast Conference Men's Basketball Tournament) was held March 2–4. All three rounds of the tournament were played at Reitz Arena in Baltimore, Maryland. defeated in the championship game, 63–59, to win the school's first ECAC Metro men's basketball tournament title. The Knights earned the automatic bid to the 1985 NCAA Tournament. ==Bracket== ==References== Category:Northeast Conference Men's Basketball Tournament Category:1984–85 ECAC Metro men's basketball season
title: 1985 ECAC Metro Men's Basketball Tournament
